title: Could use some help with figuring out what this font is?
content:
Hi there,

I have already tried using WhatMyFont, Intellifont and a few others and no luck...

What I am told by the person's whose image this is, is that it was created for him about 9-12 years ago...

[this might help as it means the font has been around a while] and that he does not have the original font name or file.

So, before having to force him to 'picking a new font', I figured I'd give this a shot...

Thank you for your help oh masters of fonts!  
Cheers,

E.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sns.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017104140/http:/typophile.com/files/sns.png) | 18.95 KB |
author: exlemor

comments.content:
Bellevue might come close. sample below, scaled down to 80 percent width. some other fiddling would be required also. obviously.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017104140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/snap_5305.png)

Hi Defiantone,

Thanks... I think you have found the right one indeed...

I knew I was right in posting - great community!

Thanks again,  
Sincerely,

E.
